overviews.title: Romeo & Juliet review – Jessie Buckley and Josh O’Connor are outstanding
overviews.body: Buckley and O’Connor head a terrific cast in this imaginatively pared down, made-for-TV production

image.alt: Jessie Buckley and Josh O’Connor in Romeo & Juliet.

overviews.title: Comfort food: the Oscars nominations are not nearly as radical as they think they are
overviews.body: As ever when the Oscar nominations are announced, there is a sense of mystery about the industry’s revealed groupthink, that consensus which is unveiled as solemnly as the half-time score at the Super Bowl.

image.alt: A gorgeously rendered monochrome fantasy ... Amanda Seyfried and Gary Oldman in David Fincher’s Mank. Photograph: Netflix/AP

overviews.title: Picasso and Paper: the doodling genius who loved a scrap – review
overviews.body: From a cut-out dove Picasso made aged eight to the sketches that led to Guernica, this spectacular show displays a relentless creativity on any paper that came to hand

image.alt: detail from Pablo Picasso, Women at Their Toilette, Paris, winter 1937–38
